allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(raster\): remove single image source in favor of tile pyramids

Remove single-image and preview-image rendering support, making tile
pyramids the only raster source. This simplifies the rendering pipeline
by eliminating all single-image/tile-mode branching.

- Delete ImageManager \(chunked upload, progressive preview->full swap\)
- Remove ImageSourceOptions, image/preview from MapOptions; make tiles required
- Remove renderImage\(\) from MapRenderer and drawImage\(\) from RasterRenderer
- Remove setImageSource\(\), onImageReady\(\), getImage\(\) from internal impl
- Remove _tileMode branching throughout mapgl.ts, setActive GL resume, etc
- Make tile fields \(tileCache, tileSize, sourceMaxZoom\) required in RenderCtx
- Delete demo pages \(worldmap, test, cors, demo/*\); keep only /map route
- Update navigation, CLAUDE.md, and public API docs
EOF
\)")
